\section*{Use cases}
\subsection*{Use case UC01}
\begin{itemize}
\item {\bf Name: }User transactions.
\item {\bf Description: }It describes the supported transactions with the banking
				system.
\end{itemize}
\subsubsection*{Scenario SC01}
\begin{tabular}{p{1in}p{4in}}
{\bf Description:} & This scenario allows a customer to withdraw money from
					a previously selected account. \\
{\bf From steps:} & START \\
{\bf To steps:} & END \\
\end{tabular}
 
\begin{tabular}{|p{0.8in}|p{1.6in}|p{1.6in}|p{1.6in}|}
\hline
Id & User Action & Condition & System Response  \bl 
SC0101 & 
						The customer selects the withdraw option.
				 & - & 
						The system creates a new withdrawal and asks for the
						amount to withdraw.
				 \bl 
SC0102 & 
						The customer fills in the amount to withdraw.
				 & - & 
						The system retrieves the current balance of the selected
						account.
					 \bl 
SC0103 & - & - & 
						The system verifies that the requested amount is not
						greater than current balance plus U$ (v5000). @authentication
					 \bl 
ADV0101 & - & - & The system asks the customer to enter her personal
						identification number. \bl 
ADV0102 & The customer fills in the personal identification number.
					 & - & The system authenticates the customer's personal
						identification number. \bl 
SC0104 & - & - & 
						The bank system withdraws the amount from the account.
					 \bl 
SC0105 & - & - & 
						The cash money is provided to the customer.
					 \bl 
\end{tabular}
\subsubsection*{Scenario SC02}
\begin{tabular}{p{1in}p{4in}}
{\bf Description:} & This scenario allows a customer to transfer money from
					a previously selected account to a
					destination account.
				 \\
{\bf From steps:} & START \\
{\bf To steps:} & END \\
\end{tabular}
 
\begin{tabular}{|p{0.8in}|p{1.6in}|p{1.6in}|p{1.6in}|}
\hline
Id & User Action & Condition & System Response  \bl 
SC0201 & 
						The customer selects the transfer option.
				 & - & 
						The system asks the customer to inform the
						destination
						bank and account.
				 \bl 
SC0202 & 
						The customer informs the destination bank and
						account.
					 & - & 
						The system asks for the amount to transfer.
					 \bl 
SC0203 & The customer fills in the amount to transfer. & - & 
						The system retrieves the current balance of the selected
						account.
					 \bl 
SC0204 & - & - & 
						The system verifies that the requested amount is not
						greater than current balance plus U$ (v5000). @authentication
					 \bl 
ADV0101 & - & - & The system asks the customer to enter her personal
						identification number. \bl 
ADV0102 & The customer fills in the personal identification number.
					 & - & The system authenticates the customer's personal
						identification number. \bl 
SC0205 & - & - & 
						The bank system withdraws the transfer amount from
						the
						originating account.
					 \bl 
SC0206 & - & - & 
						The bank system requests a transfer from the bank's own
						account to the account of the bank of the
						destination account.
					 \bl 
\end{tabular}
